app_description.message: 免費、無廣告、開源的簡單密碼生成器，適用於網頁瀏覽器。

settings_options_save_randompw_history.message: 儲存生成的隨機密碼到歷史紀錄
settings_options_save_randompw_history.description: Save generated random passwords to history

settings_options_save_fixedpw_history.message: 儲存生成的固定密碼到歷史紀錄
settings_options_save_fixedpw_history.description: Save generated fixed passwords to history

settings_options_search_matched_history.message: 自動搜尋匹配的歷史紀錄並載入參數
settings_options_search_matched_history.description: Automatically search for matching history and load parameters

settings_options_sync_to_cloud.message: 同步設定和歷史紀錄到瀏覽器提供者的雲端
settings_options_sync_to_cloud.description: Sync settings and history to browser provider's cloud

settings_options_parameter_history_descr.message: 打勾這個選項後，所有按下「生成」按鈕的參數都會被紀錄到歷史紀錄。
settings_options_parameter_history_descr.description: When this option is checked, all parameters used when clicking the 'Generate' button will be recorded in the history.

settings_options_save_randompw_history_d.message: 打勾這個選項後，所有生成的隨機密碼都會被紀錄到歷史紀錄。
settings_options_save_randompw_history_d.description: When this option is checked, all generated random passwords will be recorded in the history.

settings_options_save_fixedpw_history_de.message: 打勾這個選項後，所有生成的固定密碼都會被紀錄到歷史紀錄。
settings_options_save_fixedpw_history_de.description: When this option is checked, all generated fixed passwords will be recorded in the history.

settings_options_search_matched_history_.message: 打勾這個選項後，當輸入參數時會自動搜尋歷史紀錄中匹配相同的鹽值的紀錄，載入其參數。
settings_options_search_matched_history_.description: When this option is checked, it will automatically search for records in the history that match the same salt value when entering parameters, and load those parameters.

settings_options_sync_to_cloud_descripti.message: 打勾這個選項後，所有設定和歷史紀錄都會被同步到瀏覽器提供者的雲端，以便在不同裝置上使用相同的設定和歷史紀錄。
settings_options_sync_to_cloud_descripti.description: When this option is checked, all settings and history will be synchronized to the browser provider's cloud, allowing you to use the same settings and history on different devices.

settings_options_remember_last_parameter.message: 打勾這個選項後，當重新開啟擴展時會自動載入最後所用的參數。
settings_options_remember_last_parameter.description: When this option is checked, the last used parameters will be automatically loaded when reopening the extension.

settings_options_remember_master_passwor.message: 打勾這個選項後，主密碼會被儲存在擴展套件中，其他人有可能會因此竊取您的密碼。
settings_options_remember_master_passwor.description: When this option is checked, the master password will be stored in the extension, which may allow others to steal your password.

settings_options_hide_generated_password.message: 打勾這個選項後，生成的密碼將會被隱藏，並且需要點擊「顯示」按鈕才能看到。
settings_options_hide_generated_password.description: When this option is checked, the generated password will be hidden and you will need to click the 'Show' button to see it.

settings_options_forgot_password_expire_.message: 過一段時間後，自動遺忘主密碼，設定為 0 將不會自動忘記主密碼。
settings_options_forgot_password_expire_.description: After a period of time, automatically forget the master password. Setting to 0 will not automatically forget the master password.

settings_options_max_history_description.message: 設定歷史紀錄的上限筆數，超過上限的紀錄將會被刪除。
settings_options_max_history_description.description: Set the maximum number of history records. Records exceeding the limit will be deleted.
